H0.text: The River Durance flows into the Rhone near to which French town or city. Arles

H1.text: The River Durance flows into the Rhone near to which French town or city. Tarascon

H2.text: The River Durance flows into the Rhone near to which French town or city. Vallabrègues

H3.text: The River Durance flows into the Rhone near to which French town or city. Avignon

A4.text: The Durance itself is a tributary of the Rhône and flows into the Rhône near Avignon.
